model.description: The xRegistry model for the NPM wrapper, describing the structure and metadata for Node.js package registries and packages.

noderegistries.description: A group representing a Node.js package registry provider (e.g., npmjs.org). Contains all available Node.js package registries.

packages.description: A resource representing a Node.js package in the registry, including its metadata and available versions.

name.description: The canonical name of the Node.js package.

description.description: A short description of the package.

license.description: The license under which the package is distributed.

author.description: The author or maintainer of the package.

homepage.description: The main homepage URL for the package.

repository.description: The repository information for the package.

dependencies.description: The dependencies required by the package.

name.description: The name of the dependency package.

version.description: The version specifier for the dependency (e.g., ^1.0.0, ~2.1.0).

package.description: Cross-reference to the dependency package in the registry.

maintainers.description: A list of maintainers for the package.

dist-tags.description: Distribution tags for the package (latest, next, etc).

bugs.description: Bug tracking information for the package.

contributors.description: List of contributors to the package.

deprecated.description: Deprecation notice if the package is deprecated.

name.description: The name of the development dependency package.

version.description: The version specifier for the development dependency (e.g., ^1.0.0, ~2.1.0).

package.description: Cross-reference to the development dependency package in the registry.

name.description: The name of the peer dependency package.

version.description: The version specifier for the peer dependency (e.g., ^1.0.0, ~2.1.0).

package.description: Cross-reference to the peer dependency package in the registry.
Cross-reference to another package resource when applicable.
